mapper.sql: cid, imei, member_id, data_date,data_source, upload_time, bg_type, bg_value
mapper.select: select cid, imei, member_id, data_date, DATE_FORMAT(MAX(upload_time), '%m-%d') upload_time, bg_type, SUM(bg_value) bg_value from hd_blood_glucose where member_id=#{memberId} and DATE_FORMAT(upload_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(upload_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(upload_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY upload_time desc

select
distinct
from hd_blood_glucose
order by ${orderByClause}
SELECT data_date, data_source, upload_time, bg_type, bg_value FROM hd_blood_glucose WHERE member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY data_date DESC, bg_type ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT data_date, data_source, upload_time, bg_type, bg_value FROM hd_blood_glucose WHERE member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY data_date DESC, bg_type ASC, upload_time DESC

SELECT substring(data_date,6,5) AS data_date, data_source, upload_time, bg_type, bg_value FROM hd_blood_glucose WHERE member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND data_date > DATE_FORMAT(subdate(now(), INTERVAL 7 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY hd_blood_glucose.data_date ASC, bg_type ASC,hd_blood_glucose.upload_time ASC

select max(t.bg_value) as max,min(t.bg_value) as min, avg(t.bg_value) as avg from ( SELECT substring(data_date,6,5) AS data_date, data_source, upload_time, bg_type, bg_value FROM hd_blood_glucose WHERE member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND data_date > DATE_FORMAT(subdate(now(), INTERVAL 7 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY hd_blood_glucose.data_date ASC, bg_type ASC,hd_blood_glucose.upload_time DESC ) t
mapper.insert: insert into hd_blood_glucose (cid, imei, member_id, data_date, upload_time, bg_type, bg_value, data_source) values (#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bgType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bgValue,jdbcType=REAL}, #{dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into hd_blood_glucose
cid,
imei,
member_id,
data_date,
upload_time,
bg_type,
bg_value,
#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{dataDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{uploadTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bgType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{bgValue,jdbcType=REAL},
mapper.update:
update hd_blood_glucose
cid = #{record.cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
imei = #{record.imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_id = #{record.memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
data_date = #{record.dataDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upload_time = #{record.uploadTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bg_type = #{record.bgType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bg_value = #{record.bgValue,jdbcType=REAL},

update hd_blood_glucose set cid = #{record.cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, imei = #{record.imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_id = #{record.memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_date = #{record.dataDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upload_time = #{record.uploadTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bg_type = #{record.bgType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bg_value = #{record.bgValue,jdbcType=REAL}

update hd_blood_glucose
imei = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
data_date = #{dataDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upload_time = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bg_type = #{bgType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bg_value = #{bgValue,jdbcType=REAL},
where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update hd_blood_glucose set imei = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_date = #{dataDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upload_time = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bg_type = #{bgType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bg_value = #{bgValue,jdbcType=REAL} where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
